translations: n.蒸汽，水汽；<物>汽；忧郁，癔病（the vapours）

phrs.translation: 汽压；蒸汽压力；水汽压力

sentences.sentence: Water vapour condenses to form clouds.
I have moved from trying to model and understand the distribution and evolution of water vapour.
sentences.translation: 我已经不再试图构建和理解水汽的分布和演变的理论模式了。

sentences.sentence: One of the most powerful of all weather systems, hurricanes are powered by the heat energy released by the condensation of water vapour.
sentences.translation: 作为所有天气系统中最强大的系统之一，飓风是由水蒸气凝结释放的热能所驱动的。
